descriptionHtml:
Replaces all instances of "Fus Ro Dah" in-game with [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3H3xQzQauyY#t=24]Gilbert Gottfried's version[/url]. Click here for the [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IM_K489V4E0]in-game version.[/url]﻿
Still a bit of music left in the shout because I don't have the audio with just the shout but I tried to quieten it as much as possible.
If you don't want someone to use his version e.g. a dragon just unpack the .bsa using the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4804/?]bsa unpacker[/url] and delete the appropriate folder,
then either repack with Archive.exe in the Skyrim folder or just leave it unpacked and stick it in the data folder if you are too lazy.
author: Drokiconix
